children.name: html-content-updater.js
children.summary: Documentation generation script - converts markdown source files to HTML using templates. Processes the entire docs-source directory to create the documentation portal with navigation and styling.

children.name: init-database.js
children.summary: Database initialization and schema management - creates SQLite tables for vulnerabilities, tickets, and imports. Handles schema evolution and data migration for the HexTrackr database.

children.name: server.js
children.summary: Main Express.js application server - handles vulnerability and ticket management API endpoints, file uploads, database operations, and serves static content. Entry point for the entire HexTrackr application.
